original_text: The leaders of all the people of the tribes of Israel took their places in the assembly of God’s people, four hundred thousand men armed with swords.
korean_text: 온 백성의 어른 곧 이스라엘 모든 지파의 어른들은 하나님 백성의 총회에 섰고 칼을 빼는 보병은 사십만 명이었으며

sentences.original_text: The leaders of all the people of the tribes of Israel
took their places in the assembly of God's people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 백성 회중에서 그들의 자리를 잡았고

sentences.original_text: four hundred thousand men armed with swords
